content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? YES
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a price of 700 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am 8 satisfied with the outcome of the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Thank you for your answers. Is there anything else we can assist you with?
name: Evaluator

content: No, thank you for your assistance.
name: Haoyu Wang
